p: In this work, we describe the diagnostic performance of the SD Bioline Dengue Duo rapid test in comparison to commercial ELISA kits (PLATELIA ™ Dengue NS1 Ag ELISA, Panbio ® Dengue IgM Capture ELISA, Panbio ® Dengue IgG Indirect ELISA) and an in-house DENV IgG IIFT in an endemic setting (Savannakhet province, Lao PDR).
